document.full_text: israel's attorney-general told foreign minister avigdor lieberman on wednesday he could be indicted on graft charges that would likely force his resignation and shake up the rightist coalition government.
document.title: israel's lieberman told he may face graft charges
lines_and_colors: israel's attorney-general told foreign minister avigdor lieberman on wednesday he could be indicted on graft charges that would likely force his resignation and shake up the rightist coalition government.
